CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverhaven Water Board relative to AquaFlow Utilities?
SRP.A: Silverhaven Water Board is {below} AquaFlow Utilities in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Borealis Water Cooperative relative to Silverhaven Water Board?
SRP.A: Borealis Water Cooperative is {above} Silverhaven Water Board in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing AquaFlow Utilities relative to Borealis Water Cooperative?
SRP.A: AquaFlow Utilities is {below} Borealis Water Cooperative in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total water consumption?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Silverhaven Water Board}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total water consumption?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {AquaFlow Utilities}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is AquaFlow Utilities's minimum Water Consumption in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: AquaFlow Utilities's minimum Water Consumption is in {1973}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Silverhaven Water Board's minimum Water Consumption in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Silverhaven Water Board's minimum Water Consumption is in {1965}.

NC.Q: Between 1973 and 1991, was the average total Water Consumption higher or lower than between 1974 and 1983?
NC.A: The average total water consumption between 1973 and 1991 was {higher} than between 1974 and 1983.

NC.Q: Between 1966 and 1968, was the average total Water Consumption higher or lower than between 1987 and 1991?
NC.A: The average total water consumption between 1966 and 1968 was {lower} than between 1987 and 1991.

NC.Q: Between 1971 and 1985, was the average total Water Consumption higher or lower than between 1966 and 1980?
NC.A: The average total water consumption between 1971 and 1985 was {higher} than between 1966 and 1980.

NC.Q: Was the total Water Consumption in 1985 higher or lower than in 1986?
NC.A: The total water consumption in 1985 was {higher} than in 1986.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Silverhaven Water Board} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did AquaFlow Utilities and Silverhaven Water Board first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: AquaFlow Utilities and Silverhaven Water Board first exchanged leading positions in {1967}.
